author: Matt Mathers, Matt Mathers
title: Coronavirus: Miss England who returned to work as NHS doctor 'concerned' about lack of PPE
description: 'Nurses are constantly in contact and unwittingly the virus can be spread to other parts of the hospital due to this appalling lack of PPE'
content:
Miss England has said she is concerned about the lack of personal protective equipment (PPE) available to NHS staff fighting Covid-19 on the frontline.
Trained doctor Bhasha Mukherjee, 24, from Lincolnshire, returned from charity work in India earlier this m… [+2669 chars]
